name: A Tiny Adventure (Jan)
description:
This is a very simple game I made in like two days. Don't expect much, this is me just messing around with Bitsy for the first time. It takes 2-5 minutes to play.

You are Noah, a kid who decides that today, he is going on an adventure. He ventures out in the woods armed with nothing more than a stick he found in his front yard and perhaps some other items he brought from his friend's house.

You can interact with black items. Follow the purple stones. The doors to your friend's house may be purple, but you can enter there too.
